article_title: Moody's breaks down challenges facing healthcare organizations in 2016
article_text:
In the latest edition of Healthcare Quarterly, credit rating company Moody’s explores the challenging landscape facing healthcare organizations today, including political uncertainty in Washington and tighter financial markets.

The analysis examines how well-prepared healthcare companies are, from a credit perspective, to weather the challenges that lie ahead.

To view the sector highlights, view the gallery below.

og.description: Political uncertainty in Washington and tighter financial markets are making the future a bit murky for the industry. Here are the top challenges.
